page.title: 08Well Heads,Thornton
page.content: Our square was almost completely rural. It consisted of several isolated farmhouses which produced {DAIRY}products and also grew{HAY}for the stock animals. One farm, Jerusalem Farm, has been converted into an{ANIMAL MEAT FACTORY} and has extended the original buildings.There are traces of two disused quarries.Only a few cottages exist in this square and they have few amenities.There is one {PUBLIC HOUSE,} the White Horse Inn and two bus stops on the main road.Two pupils from our school live in the{COTTAGE}at Moscow and have to walk to and from school every day.
